body:
Build a Bash-based tool to automate the morning routine of checking pending sub-tasks across all active repositories.

- [x] Install and authenticate GitHub CLI (gh) on the local machine.

- [x] Install jq for advanced JSON processing of GitHub API responses.

- [ ] Develop daily_sync.sh script to fetch open issues from multiple repositories.

- [ ] Implement Regex logic to filter only unchecked items [ ] from issue bodies.

- [ ] Format the output into a clean, dated daily_tasks.txt file.

- [ ] Create a Bash Alias sync-tasks for quick daily execution.

- [ ] Add error handling for network issues or unauthorized API access.
